tuning_runs.notes: MASSIVE FAILURE. Two-stage evaluation adds overhead. Only 8.6% rejection rate - not enough to offset cost of 10% filter.

tuning_abort_reason: FUNDAMENTAL FLAW: Two-stage evaluation approach ADDS overhead rather than saving time. Each candidate requires BOTH 10% filter + 40% evaluation. Rejection rate too low (8.6%) to offset overhead. No tuning can fix this - approach is fundamentally broken.
